message: I propose a 62/38 split in my favor.  This is a reasonable starting point considering the inflation disadvantage I face in later rounds.
Considering the inflation rates, I'm offering a more balanced split. It's in your best interest to accept, as the value of the money will decrease significantly for you in the next round.
The money is losing value quickly for both of us.  A 50/50 split is now the fairest option.  I strongly suggest you accept.
